resources.string: This Controls the state of cpu cores. Helpful for quickly reducing temperature of Soc and saving some battery in exchange for loss of processing power.
Allows you to tune CPU governor\'s parameters. This tuning \'may\' help improve performance or reduce battery usage(if done right).
This allows users to select which set of cores are used for diffrent types of tasks mentioned below. This may improve performance or battery life depending on your configuration.
This menu consists of display pannel settings. allows users to set refresh-rates and turn on various panel features.
